categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: This series of MSE droid ran on tracks, making their ability to travel limited. They were able to consume nuts, bolts and other spare parts, including rusted droid parts. This model was one of the earliest of the MSE series.

Star Tours, a short-lived travel business, had two of these droids. One was named MSE-1T, while the other unfortunate unit was damaged and found a new use as a table for G3-5LE. The droid models frequented the Droidnostics Center of the spaceport.
In 2005, Hasbro released MSE-1T as an exclusive Star Tours action figure, but its model name has not been revealed.

The droids are not exclusively found in the Disney's Hollywood Studios version of Star Tours, but also at Tokyo Disneyland. According to the "Spot the Droid" poster for the Tokyo starport, they made their homes in the Droidnostics center, and in a map of the ride, also noted that passengers are often extremely lucky to find one.
